item.title: Demos: Using Badges on Buttons
item.description: I needed to add some button notifications (known as badges) to some buttons. The following example uses css styled badges attached to buttons using the custom-data property.

item.title: Demos: Soccer App built with OpenUI5
item.description: Have a look at this great world cup prediction game app built with OpenUI5. It shows your game predictions and infos on the stadiums as well.
